SEARCH
Package ua.toptar.toptarfuelstationpos.service

Class TransactionService

java.lang.Object
ua.toptar.toptarfuelstationpos.service.TransactionService
@Service public class TransactionService extends Object
Service class for managing transactions. Handles transaction creation, retrieval, and analytics such as sales and revenue by fuel type and period.

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionService

      public TransactionService(TransactionRepository transactionRepository, FuelTypeRepository fuelTypeRepository, UserRepository userRepository)
      Constructs a new TransactionService with the specified dependencies.
      Parameters:
      transactionRepository - the repository for accessing transaction data
      fuelTypeRepository - the repository for accessing fuel type data
      userRepository - the repository for accessing user data

  • Method Details

    • createTransaction

      public TransactionDto createTransaction(TransactionDto dto)
      Creates a new transaction based on the provided transaction data. Applies a discount for authenticated users and associates the transaction with the user.
      Parameters:
      dto - the transaction data to create
      Returns:
      the created transaction as a DTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the fuel type ID is null, invalid, or if volume/total amount is not provided correctly
      IllegalStateException - if the authenticated user or guest user is not found

    • getAllTransactions

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TransactionDto> getAllTransactions(int page, int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of all transactions.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number to retrieve
      size - the number of transactions per page
      Returns:
      a paginated list of transactions as DTOs

    • getRecentTransactions

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TransactionDto> getRecentTransactions()
      Retrieves the most recent transactions, limited to 5 entries, sorted by transaction date in ascending order.
      Returns:
      a paginated list of recent transactions as DTOs

    • getUserTransactions

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TransactionDto> getUserTransactions(Long userId, int page, int size)
      Retrieves a paginated list of transactions for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      page - the page number to retrieve
      size - the number of transactions per page
      Returns:
      a paginated list of transactions for the specified user as DTOs

    • getFilteredUserTransactions

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TransactionDto> getFilteredUserTransactions(Long userId, int page, int size, String fuelTypeName, LocalDateTime startDate)
      Retrieves a paginated list of transactions for a specific user with optional filtering by fuel type and start date.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      page - the page number to retrieve
      size - the number of transactions per page
      fuelTypeName - the name of the fuel type to filter by, can be null
      startDate - the start date to filter transactions, can be null
      Returns:
      a paginated list of filtered transactions for the specified user as DTOs

    • getFilteredTransactions

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<TransactionDto> getFilteredTransactions(int page, int size, String fuelTypeName, LocalDateTime startDate)
      Retrieves a paginated list of transactions with optional filtering by fuel type and start date.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number to retrieve
      size - the number of transactions per page
      fuelTypeName - the name of the fuel type to filter by, can be null
      startDate - the start date to filter transactions, can be null
      Returns:
      a paginated list of filtered transactions as DTOs

    • getSalesByFuelType

      public Map<String,BigDecimal> getSalesByFuelType(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate)
      Calculates the total sales volume by fuel type within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date of the range, can be null
      endDate - the end date of the range, can be null
      Returns:
      a map of fuel type names to their total sales volume

    • getRevenueByFuelTypeGroupedByPeriod

      public Map<String,Map<String,BigDecimal>> getRevenueByFuelTypeGroupedByPeriod(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate, String period)
      Calculates the revenue by fuel type, grouped by the specified period (daily, weekly, or monthly).
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date of the range, can be null
      endDate - the end date of the range, can be null
      period - the period to group by ("daily", "weekly", or "monthly")
      Returns:
      a nested map of fuel type names to period keys and their total revenue
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the period is invalid

    • getSalesByFuelTypeGroupedByPeriod

      public Map<String,Map<String,BigDecimal>> getSalesByFuelTypeGroupedByPeriod(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate, String period)
      Calculates the sales volume by fuel type, grouped by the specified period (daily, weekly, or monthly).
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date of the range, can be null
      endDate - the end date of the range, can be null
      period - the period to group by ("daily", "weekly", or "monthly")
      Returns:
      a nested map of fuel type names to period keys and their total sales volume
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the period is invalid

    • getTotalRevenueGroupedByPeriod

      public Map<String,BigDecimal> getTotalRevenueGroupedByPeriod(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate, String period)
      Calculates the total revenue, grouped by the specified period (daily, weekly, or monthly).
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date of the range, can be null
      endDate - the end date of the range, can be null
      period - the period to group by ("daily", "weekly", or "monthly")
      Returns:
      a map of period keys to their total revenue
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the period is invalid
